Attention! The application saves data locally on the device. I am still working on a database linked to a google account. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Welcome to the world!!! At the beginning of your adventure, click on the screen to get coins. They will be needed for further space exploration.
If you would like to know more about the game or have any questions, you can find me here
If you would like to support what I do, have a cool idea or would like to start cooperation, write me an e-mail
